data.body: New Bead shouldn't be a strict button when the All Repositories view is loaded.  it should be a pull down so you can select the repository first.  Upon selecting the repository the new bead page is launched and the correct target repository is selected.
data.description: New Bead shouldn't be a strict button when the All Repositories view is loaded.  it should be a pull down so you can select the repository first.  Upon selecting the repository the new bead page is launched and the correct target repository is selected.
data.title: All Repositories - New Bead
